USER_NOT_FOUND: User with this email not found.
EMAIL_IS_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address.
PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
PASSWORD_UPPERCASE_REQUIRED: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
PASSWORD_LOWERCASE_REQUIRED: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
PASSWORD_NUMBER_REQUIRED: Password must contain at least one number.
PASSWORD_SYMBOL_REQUIRED: Password must contain at least one symbol.
WORKSPACE_NAME_IS_INVALID: The workspace name must be a valid text.
SLUG_IS_INVALID: The slug must be a valid text.
SLUG_IS_TOO_SHORT: The slug must be at least 3 characters long.
SLUG_ALREADY_EXISTS: This slug is already taken. Please choose a different one.
SCREEN_NAME_IS_INVALID: The screen name must be a valid text.
SCREENS_NOT_IN_SAME_WORKSPACE_AS_PLAYLIS: Some screens do not belong to the same workspace as the playlist.
